metadata.title: CVE-2021-44225 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Keepalived through 2.2.4, the D-Bus policy does not sufficientlyrestrict the message destination, allowing any user to inspect andmanipulate any property. This leads to access-control bypass in somesituations in which an unrelated D-Bus system service has a settable(writable) property

criterions.comment: keepalived: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
